Forgot password MT4 text: Payment account is any account that you can open in trader's room. It will be used as e-wallet for making deposits and withdrawals
Name: Name
Drawdown tooltip: A drawdown is the reduction of one’s capital after a series of losing trades. This is normally calculated by getting the difference between a relative peak in capital minus a relative trough. Traders normally note this down as a percentage of their trading account.
Choose the time when requests will be da: Choose the time when requests will be daily executed (Server time)
Change subscription status text: Until your subscription is active money manager can open and close positions on your account. You can unsubscribe from money manager any time you want.
Equity description: Equity = Sum of deposits - Sum of withdrawals + Profit/Loss for closed deals + unrealized Profit/Loss
Balance description: Balance = Sum of Deposits - Sum of Withdrawals + Profit/Loss for closed deals
Process will take less than 3 minutes: Process will take less than 3 minutes

Create trading password: Create a password for your account
Are you sure want to unsubscribe?: Are you sure want to unsubscribe?
After unsubscription text 1:
After unsubscription all opened orders will be closed and no new trades on your account will be opened from this Master account.

Be careful: this action can not be canceled.
After unsubscription text 2:
After unsubscription all money from this investment account will be transfered to your payment account within 24 business hours. All opened orders will be closed and no new trades on your account will be copied from this Master account.

Be careful: this action can not be canceled.
Use login and trading password of existi: Use login and trading password of existing MetaTrader account
Use login and trading password of existing MetaTrader account
CREATE_ACCOUNT_TEXT_1: Master account is used for money management. As you will trade on Master account your positions will be allocated to your investors’ accounts.
CREATE_ACCOUNT_TEXT_2: Investment account is used for investing money. As Master trade on his account, his positions will be allocated partially to this account.
How to change/reset a password for payme: How to change/reset a password for payment account?
You can change it inside of trader’s roo: You can change it inside of trader’s room or ask our support team to reset it.
Password must contain at lease 7 symbols: Password must contain at lease 7 symbols, one number and one letter.
New Investment account was successfully: New Investment account was successfully created
CREATED_ACCOUNT_TEXT_12:
PAMM Master account like a fund consits of many investment accounts. To make a deposit on PAMM Master account, you need to:
1) Create an investment account
2) Subscribe it to that master account
3) Deposit money on it

After deposit on investment account, money will reflect on PAMM Master account.
ALLOC_METHOD_TOOLTIP:
If you activate this function, you will get signals for the minimum position size that is set on trading platform server every time when money manager make a trade.

Position with minimum available lot size on server (usually 0.01 for currencies) will be opened even if projected position size from master account to your investment account is smaller.

When function is off you will not get signals for positions that should be opened on your account with lot size smaller than minimum lot size.
In the list above you can find accounts: In the list above you can find accounts with same account type as a master account below
You have no accounts that you can subscr: You have no accounts that you can subscribe to that master account. Please create a new one.
Process will take less than 1 minutes: Process will take less than 1 minutes
You can withdraw not more than free marg: You can withdraw not more than free margin without closing the account. If amount is bigger than free margin, it will be automatically reduced.
Margin is used for maintaing opened posi: Margin is used for maintaing opened positions. Insufficient margin can cause automatic closing of opened positions (stop-out) to prevent negative balance on your account.
If close some of opened positions on you: If close some of opened positions on your account, it will increase your free margin.
Make a withdrawal from Investment accoun: Make a withdrawal from Investment account
Make a withdrawal from Master account: Make a withdrawal from Master account
CLOSE_POSITIONS_TEXT:
By performing that action you will unsubscribe from all signal providers and all opened positions will be closed.

Opened positions will be closed during trading session.
If you want to withdraw all your funds f: If you want to withdraw all your funds from investment account and unsubscribe from moneymanager - close your account
See your pending Deposit/Withdrawal requ: See your pending Deposit/Withdrawal requests and history transfers between payment account and investment account.
If you want to withdraw all your funds f: If you want to withdraw all your funds from Master account - close your account. But all your investors will be unsubscribed from this account automatically.
Be sure you have enough free margin to m: Be sure you have enough free margin to maintain opened positions on your account after withdrawal.
Withdrawal request will be executed duri: Withdrawal request will be executed during rollover within 24 business hours.

Monitor and manage all your investors on: Monitor and manage all your investors on My Investors page: change allocation methods, activate and deativate them.
Now you can withdraw all funds from this: Now you can withdraw all funds from this account or subscribe it to another money manager.
If you made this request during weekend,: If you made this request during weekend, your positions will be closed when market will open on Monday.
Your account was unsubscribed from a mon: Your account was unsubscribed from a money manager and all opened positions were closed.
Request for closing account successfully: Request for closing account №{{requestNumber}} successfully created
Your account will be closed during rollo: Your account will be closed during rollover within 24 business hours.
After closing account it will be unsubsc: After closing account it will be unsubscribed from a money manager.

No deposit available:
You can not make a deposit on investment account until it not subscribed to Master PAMM account.

To subscribe to a PAMM account you need to:

1. Go to a Leaderboard
2. Choose PAMM account
3. Click on subscribe button
All Deposit and Withdrawal requests from: All Deposit and Withdrawal requests from investors are executed during rollover.
You can choose one or several hours and: You can choose one or several hours and set daily schedule for automatic rollovers. (server time)
How to change risk limit: Daily risk limit is your automated risk manager. It will protect your account from big losses in one day.
Please ask our support team to set it. R: Please ask our support team to set it. Risk limit doesn’t work if trader can change it by himself.
What risk limit do: Risk Limit will close all opened positions and unsubscribe you from money manager as soon as it reached.

Risk limit description:
Risk limit is a tool that can help you control your risks and protect your profit.

It is calculated from Balance High Water Mark (Highest High point of Balance, Balance = Sum of all deposits - sum of your withdrawals + closed PnL of positions).

After setting a risk limit for your account you will see a signal equity - the equity of your account where your account will be closed by a risk limit.

Once it is reached, all opened positions will be closed and account will be unsubscribed from all money managers.

Recommendation:

1) Don’t set risk limits too close to current equity of your account. Make it not less than 20-30% lower.

2) Please notice that after reaching the first one you should use double numbers to achieve right results. So previous risk limit was reached at 20% DD limit and you want to set it as another 20%, you should set 40% (20% for past and 20% for future) but not just another 20%.
Account is closed. To perform any action: Account is closed. To perform any action, please activate it
You have reached max number of allowed a: You've reached Max number of active subscriptions. Please unsubscribe from one of traders and try again.
Fixed lot allocation Exp:
Pos_Inv = Ratio

When manager is using this allocation method investor will get order size equal to ratio. Size of master/investment accounts and Size of master pisition are not taken into calculations.
